address.Common.Line1: Cornell Oaks Corporate Center Ridgeview Building

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Cornell Oaks Corporate Center Ridgeview Building

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Cornell Oaks Corporate Center Ridgeview Building

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Cornell Oaks Corporate Center Ridgeview Building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Cornell Oaks Corporate Center is a 684,635-SF, master-planned office/flex corporate center. It features professional property management and flexible floor plans. Tenants enjoy high quality improvements, fitness center, conferencing facility, on-site parking, and nearby retail amenities. Each building is beautifully designed and has lush landscaping and water features. The site is conveniently located approximately 10 minutes from
Downtown Portland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ridgeview is a three-building, 93,243-SF flex project with grade-level and dock-high loading doors.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Cornell Oaks Corporate Center is a 684,635-SF, master-planned office/flex corporate center. It features professional property management and flexible floor plans. Tenants enjoy high quality improvements, fitness center, conferencing facility, on-site parking, and nearby retail amenities. Each building is beautifully designed and has lush landscaping and water features. The site is conveniently located approximately 10 minutes from Downtown Portland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Waterside is a four-building, 125,028-SF office/flex project. The buildings are centered around a lush water features with bridges, decks, walkways, and waterfall. The project was designed for research-oriented firms. It received a NAIOP award for Best Flex Building.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 6,018 SF with Kitchen, Breakroom, Private Restrooms
Furniture Available, Monument Signage Opportunity, Warehouse w/ Grade Roll-up Door
3 Private Offices, Conference Room, Server Room, 3:1,000 Parking

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 6K SF Beaverton Sublease with Small Warehouse
